title: Naloxone Drip Dosing
desc: Naloxone Drip Dosing doses naloxone for acute opioid overdose.

orgreference.text: Goldfrank L, Weisman RS, Errick JK, Lo MW. A dosing nomogram for continuous infusion intravenous naloxone. Ann Emerg Med. 1986;15(5):566-70.

other_refer.text: Boyer EW. Management of opioid analgesic overdose. N Engl J Med. 2012;367(2):146-55.
Clarke S, Dargan P, Jones A. Naloxone in opioid poisoning: walking the tightrope. Emergency Medicine Journal : EMJ. 2005;22(9):612-616. doi:10.1136/emj.2003.009613.

data.evidence:
Continuous IV infusion starting rate (mg/hr) = (⅔× bolus dose mg) per hour. Half of the bolus dose may be administered 15 minutes after starting drip.

Bolus dose = total dose required in the first 1 hour.

Titrate to respiratory rate, hypoxia and/or CNS depression.

Decrease rate if withdrawal symptoms occur.

inputs.name: bolus
inputs.tips_en: Total dose required in the first hour
